```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(mice)
```

```{r}
head(penguins)
pairs(penguins)
md.pattern(penguins)

dat = palmerpenguins::penguins

imp = mice(dat, m=10, method = "pmm", maxit = 10, seed = 1)

dat_imp = complete(imp, 1)
```

# Logistic regression
```{r}

fit.log <- glm( sex ~. , data = penguins, family = binomial)
summary(fit.log)
fit.log.step <- step(fit.log, direction = "backward")
summary(fit.log.step)
```
